DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study evaluate feasibility non-behavioral health provider deliver combination manual therapy ( MT ) cognitive behavioral therapy pain ( CBT-p ) . In addition , evaluate difference outcomes patient undergo combine intervention CBT-p MT undergo MT alone .
DOC.brief_title: Mind Body Intervention Chronic Lower Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Given pilot study use simple descriptive statistic patient characteristic , include age , sex , BMI baseline score outcome measure . In addition ass inter-rater reliability score delivery CBT-p two trained practitioner utilize kappa statistic . We perform data analysis use SPSS .
DOC.criteria: 18 69 year age CLBP `` high risk '' poor prognosis base SBST currently undergo chiropractic care . Contraindications either MT CBTp . Patients currently undergo CBTp treat substance abuse past year .
